mapper.select: select sex sextype, count(*) sexNum from t_facefeature where face_id in (select face_id from t_entrytime where (user_id=#{userId}) and (str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(entry_time, '%Y-%m-%d')) and str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(entry_time, '%Y-%m-%d')) group by sex;
